data.title: Business Consulting Insights & Research Reports
data.meta_description: Gain valuable business consulting insights and research reports at FTI Consulting. Our insights offer resources for topics that matter to your business.
data.text:
Secure Design: A Matter of Responsibility and Diligence

August 29, 2024—With the advancement of digital tech and the need to perform the most diverse activities, the protection of data and computing becomes increasingly critical.

Read Article

SEC’s New Cybersecurity Rules Have Global Reach

August 28, 2024—SEC’s cybersecurity rules, applicable to publicly traded companies, have impacts globally. Those operating in the U.S. must comply with specific obligations.

Read Article

Safeguarding Investments: The Vital Role of Cybersecurity in Private Equity

August 27, 2024—In the dynamic, high-stakes environment of private equity investment, the role of cybersecurity in value creation, retention, and growth is often overlooked.

Read Article

Is Cyber Resilience on Your Board’s Agenda?

August 26, 2024—Is your organization prepared for the next major IT incident? See how the July 2024 outage is reshaping cybersecurity strategies worldwide.

Read Article

Cost Optimisation in Insurance: Now Is the Time To Get Started

August 26, 2024—The global insurance market faces cost pressures. FTI Consulting offers expert guidance and solutions to help you achieve sustainable cost savings.

Read Article

Are Distressed-Debt Exchanges More Likely To Avert or Delay a Bankruptcy?

August 23, 2024—Discusses prevalence of DDEs and evaluates the likeliness of companies completing a DDE to engage in a subsequent distressed exchange/bankruptcy filing.

Read Article

Arbitration in Brazil

August 21, 2024—Explore the Brazilian arbitration market's growth and benefits as a dispute resolution method, comparing it to the Judiciary in efficiency and cost.

Read Report

Leveraging Technology to Transform a Legacy Newsgathering Model

August 20, 2024—FTI Consulting helped the news division of a major American broadcast network revamp its legacy “show-led” newsgathering processes and assisted in the design.

Read Case Study
